landing.title: Find Your Perfect Match
landing.subtitle: Connect with amazing people across Africa
landing.readyToExperience: Ready to Experience a Connection Like No Other?
landing.embraceCulture: Embrace culture, art, and soul‚Äîfind someone who truly gets you.

features.liveStreamingDesc: Watch and connect with people in real-time
features.eventsDesc: Join local events and meet new people
features.triviaDesc: Challenge others and win exciting prizes

sections.globalNetworksDesc: Connect with people from all corners of the globe. Whether you're into classical art, traditional dance, ancient literature, or contemporary global movements‚Äîfind your tribe.
sections.virtualDatesDesc: Explore new ways to connect, like cooking a dish together over video call, sharing your favorite poetry, or showing each other local art galleries.
sections.sharedEventsDesc: Attend exclusive online and offline cultural events: film festivals, music festivals, poetry slams, or even regional festivals. Meet your match while immersing yourself in art, culture, and history.
sections.curatedPlaylistsDesc: Each week, enjoy curated playlists designed around different cultural genres. Find someone to vibe with over an Afrobeat playlist or discover classical Eastern music together.
sections.intellectualDialogueDesc: Engage in meaningful conversations, whether it's about philosophy, literature, or film. Our platform's focus is on building deeper emotional and intellectual connections.
sections.culturalQuizDesc: Find out which cultural experiences resonate with your soul through a simple yet thoughtful quiz that reflects your values, interests, and artistic tastes.
sections.personalizedMatchDesc: Using your cultural preferences, passions, and personality traits, we match you with others who share similar lifestyles, traditions, and ideology.
sections.shareConnectDesc: Participate in engaging conversations, exchange creative works, explore unique cultural events, or enjoy a virtual dinner date with someone who speaks your cultural language.
sections.testimonial1: I met someone who shares my passion for classical Indian dance. We're collaborating on a project now, and it's the most inspiring relationship I've ever had.
sections.testimonial2: We connected over shared knowledge of zulu art, and now we travel to galleries together. I've never felt so understood!
sections.testimonial3: I was looking for a partner who could appreciate my heritage and traditions, and I found that with someone who shares my love for North African poetry.
sections.culturalQuizzesDesc: Which traditional music genre is your spirit song?
sections.digitalJourney: Embark on a Digital Cultural Journey
sections.digitalJourneyDesc: Participate in virtual cultural tours, from ancient ruins to contemporary street art scenes.
sections.culturalSignDesc: Explore connections based on your cultural heritage or spiritual background.

common.termsFooter: By signing in, you agree to our community guidelines and commit to respectful, authentic connections within our culturally-rich environment.

step1.title: Terms of Service
step1.description: Please review and accept our terms
step1.welcome: Welcome to √íloo! By using our service, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy. We prioritize your safety and cultural connections.

step5.title: Add Photos
step5.description: Show your best self! Add at least one photo
step5.dragDrop: Drag & drop or click to upload (max 6 photos)
step5.tip: üí° **Tip:** Your first photo will be your main profile picture. Add multiple angles and genuine smiles!

step6.title: You're All Set!
step6.description: Welcome to √íloo - let's find your perfect match
step6.readyDescription: Your profile is complete and you're ready to discover amazing people who share your culture and values.

resetPassword.securityNote: For security reasons, we don't disclose whether an email exists in our system. If you don't receive an email, please check your spam folder.

index.premiumExperience: Premium dating experience for sophisticated connections

about.title: About √íloo
about.description: √íloo is a premium dating platform designed to celebrate African culture while fostering meaningful connections across the diaspora.
about.missionText: We believe in bringing people together through shared values, cultural appreciation, and authentic connections. √íloo provides a safe, secure, and culturally-rich environment for individuals to find meaningful relationships.
about.culturalCelebration: Cultural celebration at the heart of every connection
about.advancedVerification: Advanced verification systems for safety and authenticity
about.premiumFeatures: Premium features designed for meaningful relationships
about.contactText: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you at

shopPage.title: Virtual Shop
shopPage.subtitle: Spend your coins on exclusive items to customize your profile
shopPage.unlockExclusive: Unlock exclusive VIP items including legendary badges, premium themes, and special customizations
shopPage.seasonalDesc: Limited-time items available only during special events and holidays
shopPage.noSeasonalDesc: There are no seasonal items available right now. Check back during holidays and special events for exclusive limited-time items!
shopPage.noVipItems: No VIP items available at the moment
